name: Fail Safe (MonkeyKidGC, GaryCMKGC)
description:
Built for Brackeys Game Jame 2021.1 - Stronger Together

Check out our Blog  at MonkeyKidGC.com for Unity tutorials and other game development tips and tricks.

Your mission should you choose to accept it.  Save the Earth

Use your ship to maneuver through space and using your lasers to keep asteroids at bay.

Place a pair of super powerful laser magnets to deploy your laser.

Be warned One Will Not Be Enough

Lasers are STRONGER TOGETHER.

Lasers will slow down and eventually destroy an asteroid but if a single laser or it's laser magnet take too much of a load they will fail.

50 Rounds

Survive 50 rounds of non stop asteroid smashing action to survive this onslaught and save the world.

Let the people down and they are sure to give you an ear full.
